title: AR/AP Specialist
job_overview:
Location: Remote | Full-Time
Company: The Guiding Star LLC

Job Overview:
We are looking for a highly analytical and detail-oriented AR/AP Specialist to manage the full cycle of accounts receivable and payable operations. This role supports U.S.-based real estate clients, ensuring accurate transaction processing, vendor management, and adherence to U.S. GAAP standards. You will play a vital role in maintaining the financial integrity of daily transactions and cash flow management.

Key Responsibilities:
Process and monitor incoming payments, invoices, and vendor transactions.
Maintain accurate records of AR/AP activities and ensure compliance with internal controls.
Conduct regular reviews of aged receivables and follow up on outstanding balances.
Manage vendor communications, onboarding, and payment schedules.
Support month-end close activities, including accruals and journal entries.
Collaborate with internal departments to resolve discrepancies in billing and payments.
Prepare financial reports and reconciliation schedules 
Perform other related administrative tasks as required to support overall team operations


Qualifications:
3-5 years of U.S. accounting or bookkeeping experience (real estate experience preferred)
At least 3-5 years of bookkeeping/accounting experience overall
Strong knowledge of U.S. GAAP and solid understanding of accounting principles
Proficient in QuickBooks and/or AccountEdge
Familiarity with additional accounting software such as Xero or NetSuite is a plus
CPA license is an advantage but not required
Excellent organizational and time management skills
High attention to detail and accuracy in all financial tasks
Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities
Ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines in a fast-paced, remote work environment
Excellent communication skills both written and verbal
Strong stakeholder management skills, preferably with North American client experience


Benefits:
Competitive salary and internet allowance
Paid Time Off
Health insurance coverage or reimbursement
Yearly bonus
Performance-based salary increase
Monthly company-sponsored engagement activities
Referral Incentive - 5,000 for every successful referral
Flexible working schedule

Minimum technical requirements:
Processor (CPU): Intel Core i5 (10th gen or newer) or AMD Ryzen 5 (3000 series or newer)
RAM: 8 GB minimum (16 GB recommended)
Storage: 256 GB SSD (minimum)
Operating System: Windows 10/11 (Pro or Home) or macOS
Webcam & Microphone: 720p HD webcam and external microphone or headset with noise cancellation for clear communication

Help Us Keep Things Running Smoothly!
Are you detail-oriented, dependable, and proactive? We’re looking for someone just like you to join our team and help us stay organized and on track.
